attributes.action: Accommodation charges to University Sudents all over the UK should be reimbursed
attributes.additional_details: Government has been literally ruthless to University Student by overseeing COVID - 19 and putting them to a life thteatening situation. Parents are devastated to know that they cannot bring their Adult children at home in case their children are COVID - 19 positive, it seems that whole agenda was concocted to get the rent instalment which is the highest at first term. Students who wish to study online from home in current situation should be reimbursed with their Fee and Accommodation charges.
attributes.background: Universities are conducting online classes, there is no point for students to live at Rented Accommodtions. It is unnecessary financial burden on the students which should be avoided where it is possible. Students are practically hostages at the moment and living far away from their homes.

rejection.details:
This is a contractual matter between students and their universities or private accommodation providers.

You can find out more about ending your tenancy agreement here: https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/housing/renting-a-home/student-housing/students-in-university-accommodation/student-housing-ending-your-agreement-in-halls/.

You may also wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.

Find out more: https://committees.parliament.uk/work/192/the-governments-response-to-coronavirus/
